query.statement:
SELECT A.PSPID ,B.ZSITE_NM ,V.RECAD_DA ,(CASE WHEN VALUE(MIN(Z.STATE) , '')<> 'Y' THEN 'NO' ELSE 'YES' END) AS BALJAU
,A.MDATE ,A.MTIME ,A.ERNAM ,VALUE((SELECT X.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.USERNUMB = A.ERNAM), '') AS ERNAMNM ,A.EDATE ,A.AENAM , VALUE((SELECT X.USERNAME FROM SAPHEE.ZUSERF AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.USERNUMB = A.AENAM), '') AS AENAMNM ,A.ETIME ,(SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN '√∑∫Œ' ELSE 'πÃ√∑∫Œ' END FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL001 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X.GBN = 'J1' AND X.PSPID = A.PSPID) AS FILE
FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1601 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBAK AS V ON A.MANDT = V.MANDT AND A.PSPID = V.ZZPJT_ID
INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS B ON V.MANDT = B.MANDT AND V.ZZPJT_ID= B.POSID
INNER JOIN (SELECT T1.MANDT, T1.PSPID, MIN(VALUE(T2.STATE, '')) AS STATE FROM ( SELECT X1.MANDT, X1.POSID AS PSPID, X1.POSID_1 AS POSID, MAX(VALUE(X2.CHGNO, '') ) AS CHGNO FROM SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS X3 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS X1 ON X3.MANDT = X1.MANDT AND X3.POSID = X1.POSID
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0100 AS X2 ON X1.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X1.POSID = X2.PSPID AND X1.POSID_1 = X2.POSID
WHERE X1.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND X1.TXT04 <> 'C' AND X1.ZZGUBUN IN ('10', '11', '12', '13', '14', '20') AND X3.PRCMT = 'Y'
AND X3.POSID = #PSPID#
GROUP BY X1.MANDT, X1.POSID, X1.POSID_1 ) AS T1
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0113 AS T2 ON T1.MANDT = T2.MANDT AND T2.CNF_GBN = 'A' AND T1.PSPID = T2.PSPID AND T1.POSID = T2.POSID AND T1.CHGNO = T2.CHGNO AND T2.GUBUN = '5' AND T2.STATE = 'Y' GROUP BY T1.MANDT, T1.PSPID ) AS Z
ON A.MANDT = Z.MANDT AND A.PSPID = Z.PSPID
WHERE A.MANDT= #G_MANDT#
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
AND B.PRCMT = 'Y'
GROUP BY A.MANDT ,A.PSPID ,B.ZSITE_NM ,V.RECAD_DA ,A.MDATE ,A.MTIME ,A.ERNAM ,A.EDATE ,A.AENAM ,A.ETIME
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
